name: acrobatics
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the user has no held item, this move has double power.
short_effect: Has double power if the user has no held item.

flavor_text.x-y: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
